evolvedCards.name: Kim Jong Il
evolvedCards.charDescription: It's all a lie. They're just pretending to praise me

evolvedCards.name: Napolean
evolvedCards.charDescription: Religion is what keeps the poor from murdering the rich

evolvedCards.name: Ghenghis Khan
evolvedCards.charDescription: To get drunken twice a month is better; once still more praiseworthy

evolvedCards.name: Margaret Thatcher
evolvedCards.charDescription: I seem to smell the stench of appeasement in the air

evolvedCards.name: Adolf Hitler
evolvedCards.charDescription: Anyone who paints the sky green needs sterilised

evolvedCards.name: Josef Stalin
evolvedCards.charDescription: Death is the solution to all problems - no man, no problem

evolvedCards.name: Charles Darwin
evolvedCards.charDescription: I love fools' experiments. I am always making them

evolvedCards.name: Martin Luther King
evolvedCards.charDescription: I look to a day when people will not be judged by the color of their skin.

evolvedCards.name: Marie Curie
evolvedCards.charDescription: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas

evolvedCards.name: Albert Einstein
evolvedCards.charDescription: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.

evolvedCards.name: William Shakespeare
evolvedCards.charDescription: When the feeling's gone and you can't go on, its tragedy.

evolvedCards.name: Ghandi
evolvedCards.charDescription: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind
